Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to establishing a public housing construction and preservation fund for the city of New York
Summary: Establishes a public housing construction and preservation fund for the city of New York.
LawCode: Add Art 13 Title 1-A §§402-f - 402-h, Pub Hous L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public housing law, in relation to establishing a public housing construction and preservation fund for the city of New York
